successes.title: Steampunk Rally
successes.description: Finally! A true steampunk game featuring 108 translucent dice, 16 famed inventors, and unique dice-placement & card-drafting mechanics.

Pledges.description: SUPPORTER - Donate any amount of money over $1 to show your support for the project!  If you are on the fence, this will also allow you to see comments and updates!
PRINT N PLAY - Receive all files required to make your own copy of Steampunk Rally.  Files will be zipped and delivered in .pdf format.
INVENTOR - ($49 USD) Receive one copy of Steampunk Rally with all stretch goals!  Free Shipping to USA & Canada!  Add $25 to your pledge to ship to EU, or $45 to ship worldwide.
WRIGHT BROTHERS - ($98 USD) Receive TWO copies of Steampunk Rally with all stretch goals!  Free Shipping to USA & Canada!  Add $33 to your pledge to ship to EU, or $50 to ship worldwide.
AEROSTAT - ($138 USD) Receive THREE copies of Steampunk Rally with all stretch goals!  Free Shipping to USA & Canada.  Add $35 to your pledge to ship to EU, or $55 to ship worldwide.
DIRIGIBLE - ($238 USD) Receive SIX copies of Steampunk Rally with all stretch goals ($40 USD each)!  Free Shipping to USA & Canada.  Add $19 to your pledge to ship to EU, or $29 to ship worldwide.

TESLA - ($285 USD) Receive an upgraded LIMITED EDITION copy of Steampunk Rally with all stretch goals!  This beautiful custom version of the game comes with thick plastic laminated matte-finish cards, heavy wooden track tiles, and 40 metal cogs.  Worldwide shipping included. You will receive this 1-2 months before the game's release.

TESLA - ($352 USD) Receive an upgraded LIMITED EDITION copy of Steampunk Rally with all stretch goals!  This beautiful custom version of the game comes with thick plastic laminated matte-finish cards, heavy wooden track tiles, and 40 metal cogs.  Tesla Improvement: this and all previous Tesla Edition Levels will receive translucent dice!  Worldwide shipping included. You will receive this 1-2 months before the game's release.

TESLA - ($390 USD) Receive an upgraded LIMITED EDITION copy of Steampunk Rally with all stretch goals!  This beautiful custom version of the game comes with thick plastic laminated matte-finish cards, heavy wooden track tiles, 40 metal cogs, and translucent dice!  Tesla Improvement: this and all previous Tesla Edition Levels will receive a pearl finish art card featuring the Nikola Tesla and a custom brass plate with the word "Tesla" on one side and a unique number on the inside on the box.  Worldwide shipping included. You will receive this 1-2 months before the game's release.

TESLA - ($404 USD) Receive an upgraded LIMITED EDITION copy of Steampunk Rally with all stretch goals!  This beautiful custom version of the game comes with heavy wooden track tiles, 40 metal cogs, translucent dice, pearl finish art card, custom brass plate.  Tesla Improvement: this and all previous Tesla Edition Levels will receive an upgrade from laminated cards to fully synthetic, virtually indestructible cards.  Worldwide shipping included. You will receive this 1-2 months before the game's release.

TESLA - ($410 USD) Receive an upgraded LIMITED EDITION copy of Steampunk Rally with all stretch goals!  This beautiful custom version of the game comes with heavy wooden track tiles, 40 metal cogs, translucent dice, pearl finish art card, custom brass plate.  Tesla Improvement: this and all previous Tesla Edition Levels will receive an upgrade from laminated cards to fully synthetic, virtually indestructible cards.  Worldwide shipping included. You will receive this 1-2 months before the game's release.
